sen.j: 治承4年（1180年）の治承・寿永の乱に際して甲斐源氏も蜂起し、その中で同年12月24日に有義の妻子が都で何者かに殺害され、獄門される事件が起きている。
sen.e: There was an incident in which Kai-Genji uprose as well in Jisho-Juei War that occurred in 1180, and during the battle, someone killed Ariyoshi's wife and children in Miyako (capital) and exposed their heads at a prison gate on December 24, 1180.
